# Set up website locally

## 1. Prerequisites

- [Git](https://git-scm.com)
- [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/) with `npm`.
- [`pnpm`](https://pnpm.io)
- Shell of your choice.

## 2. Clone the repository

```ps
git clone https://github.com/files-community/Website
```
```ps
cd Website
```

## 2. Install dependencies

```ps
pnpm i
```

## 3. Run build script

```ps
pnpm run dev
```
